attributes.action: Minimum Wage Pay must Equal A Single Person Sole income UK Household Expenses
attributes.additional_details: The reason that people are reliant on the Government, is because there is high unemployment; and Employers do not cover the bare Life Bills.  People need jobs that pay good salary because life bills are very high and wages offered by employers are tiny in comparison. Low pay causes debt. Junior/Trainee jobs are a reason to hire cheap young labour. Employers are Segregating Good jobs via obscure European language, they know most East London speak English only, or Asian & African based languages.
attributes.background: Unemployment causes poverty. Low paying jobs causes debt. Cost of living in the UK for a Single person Sole income household homeowner is not equal to minimum wage. London is one of the most expensive places to live in the world. Maximum wage is needed to keep working people above the poverty line.
